buildCommand: export HOME=/root RUSTUP_HOME=/root/.rustup CARGO_HOME=/root/.cargo && curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- -y --profile minimal --default-toolchain stable && export PATH="$CARGO_HOME/bin:$PATH" && cargo install wasm-pack --version 0.12.1 && cd ../rust && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../web/public/pkg --out-name crypto_wasm && cd ../web && npm run build
